target: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Reference number is : GVM0PAM2 .
context: <user> I am looking for a hotel named alyesbray lodge guest house. <system> i have their info, what would you like to know? <user> I would like to book a reservation for it. Can you help me with that? <system> I sure can. First, I will need to know when you want your stay to begin and how many days you'll be staying. Also, how many people will be staying? <user> We will be arriving on Sunday and will stay for 5 nights. <system> Can you tell me how many guests will be staying in the room? <user> There will be 8 guests. <system> Booking was successful. Your reference number is 4UFN3SWC . Will that be all for today?<user> that is it thank you. <system> You have a nice day then!<user> Can you actually look up a restaurant for me as well? <system> sure thing what's the area and or name?<user> It's a place called Don Pasquale Pizzeria. <system> A very nice place in the centre. Need a reservation?<user> Yes, I do. Ill need it booked for the same day, same people, and wed like to eat at 19:00. <system>
